tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ConcertData (
  concert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  concert_name VARCHAR(255),
  concert_date DATE,
  venue_name VARCHAR(255),
  total_tickets_sold INT,
  ticket_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE TicketSales (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_id INT,
    ticket_type VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    sale_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ticket_sales (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_id INT,
    ticket_type VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    sale_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE audience_demographics (
    audience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_id INT,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    income_range VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Concerts (
    concert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_name TEXT,
    concert_date DATE,
    venue TEXT,
    attendance INT
);

CREATE TABLE Tickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_id INT,
    ticket_type TEXT,
    ticket_price DECIMAL,
    sale_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ticket_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    payment_method TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Concerts (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_name STRING,
    concert_date DATE,
    attendance_count INT,
    ticket_sales DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Venues (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    venue_name STRING,
    venue_capacity INT,
    location STRING,
    contact_person STRING
);

CREATE TABLE Tickets (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ticket_number INT,
    price DECIMAL,
    status STRING,
    concert_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE Reviews (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    review_text STRING,
    rating INT,
    customer_id UUID,
    concert_id UUID
);
